OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_55.context: NodeContext: Overall Arc: Shadowheart has rejected Shar and is on a mission to Baldur's Gate to save her captive parents.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.text: I'm not here to answer to you, or anyone else. I'm here for my parents.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_7.context: NodeContext: Overall Arc: Shadowheart has rejected Shar and is on a mission to Baldur's Gate to save her captive parents.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_68.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_68.context: NodeContext: Overall arc: Shadowheart has been blessed by her goddess Shar after sacrificing Nightsong. She is now on a mission to seize control of Shar's church and followers in Baldur's Gate

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_15.context: NodeContext: Overall arc: Shadowheart has been blessed by her goddess Shar after sacrificing Nightsong. She is now on a mission to seize control of Shar's church and followers in Baldur's Gate

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_54.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_54.text: I just lost a wager, thanks to you.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_39.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_39.text: Someone who bet that you'd never be foolish enough to actually show your face in this city again. But here you are, and the gold in my purse is soon to take flight.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_48.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_48.text: I can't help but feel the strangest twinge of disgust as I look upon you. Is it true? Has our Lady forsaken you?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_21.text: *A follower of Shar. An agent of the Mother Superior. Sent to keep watch for you.*

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_63.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_63.text: I'm not here to answer to you, or anyone else. I'm here for my parents.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_62.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_62.text: So, the rot of heresy has gripped you. So be it.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_66.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_66.text: Now I must report your reappearance. If you are intent on bringing matters to a head, then seek out the House of Grief, in the Lower City.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_33.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_33.text: Tell me one thing... Is there someone called Rennald there? A tiefling with short horns and purple hair.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.text: Rennald... Now there is a name I haven't heard in a while. He is no more. I'll leave the rest for you to find out, heretic.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_8.context: NodeContext: Unpleasant smile, relishing in twisting the knife. (In reality 'Rennald' is now Nightshade, a transgender friend of Shadowheart's who she can't remember).

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_32.text: Though if I was you, I'd be very tempted to just forget it all and disappear. You have some form at doing so, after all.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_35.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_35.text: Shar forsakes everyone in the end. Her embrace is a lie.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_40.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_40.text: I have... strayed, it is true. But I have come to make amends, and face judgement.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_59.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_59.text: No true child of Lady Shar would be that poor a liar. The rot of heresy truly has taken hold in you.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_31.text: Bold of you - brave, even. Though do not assume passing admiration will translate to mercy when you kneel before the Mother Superior.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_18.text: If that was supposed to be a pick-up line, I think it needs more work.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_65.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_65.text: Don't flatter yourself - you're not my type. Even though we have more in common than you remember.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_1.text: Insolent, even now. I heard you were like that.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_36.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_36.text: Many of us were convinced you'd never actually show your face in this city again. But here you are, and the gold in my purse is soon to take flight.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_69.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_69.text: What a sight for sore eyes. I believe there's somewhere you're supposed to be, no? Long overdue, in fact.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_70.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_70.text: No, but I know you. I was told to keep watch for you and point you towards home, should you ever appear.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_42.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_42.text: Maybe so. Where is it you think I'm expected?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_47.text: Why, home, of course. The only one you have ever known. I was told to keep watch for you and point you towards home, should you ever appear.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_30.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_30.text: No. Perhaps you've mistaken me for somebody else?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_20.text: There is no mistake, Shadowheart. I was told to keep watch for you and point you towards home, should you ever appear.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_2.text: And lo, you have appeared. It is time for you to return to the fold.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_4.text: She did. And I feel her patience is running thin. I hope you have good news for her. First, you need to continue onwards into the Lower City.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_13.text: Then seek out a place called the House of Grief. It may not be quite what you expect, but I assure you it's the right spot. Go there, and make yourself known. You will be given the welcome you deserve.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_34.text: Oh no, I must remain here. In truth, I'm glad to keep my distance for now... There's been some tension in the ranks. It seems a great deal is riding on the outcome of your mission.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_37.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_37.text: Besides, I have business to attend to, wares to sell. Our great endeavour cannot run on faith alone - we need funds. Have a look, if you wish.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_26.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_26.text: What can I expect once I'm admitted?

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_41.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_41.text: And spoil the surprise? I dare not. Though I will admit there's been some tension in the ranks. It seems a great deal is riding on the outcome of your mission.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_29.text: I don't envy you, I'll admit... There's been some tension in the ranks. It seems a great deal is riding on the outcome of your mission.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_5.text: I'll be remaining here - I have business to attend to, wares to sell. Our great endeavour cannot run on faith alone - we need funds. Have a look, if you wish.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_51.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_51.text: Otherwise, I think we're done. Try not to dawdle too much in the city - Mother's waiting.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_58.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_58.text: Tell me... is there someone called Rennald there? A tiefling with short horns and purple hair.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_53.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_53.text: Rennald... Now there's a name I haven't heard in some time. But not for me to spoil what Lady Shar would keep hidden from you. Best if you looked for yourself.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_19.text: You're talking about the cloister? Point the way.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_71.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_71.text: So close to home and yet you need a guiding hand. Amazing how malleable - or fragile - the mind can be. First, you need to continue onwards into the Lower City.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_43.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_43.text: I'm not here to submit. I'm here to cleanse Lady Shar's ranks. She decreed it.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_OOM_12.text: Hmm. Some thought you might have been humbled by your mission - learned a little deference. Clearly not. First, you must continue into the Lower City.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_COM_10.text: I just lost a wager, thanks to you.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_20.context: NodeContext: Overall Arc: Shadowheart has rejected Shar and is on a mission to Baldur's Gate to save her captive parents.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_COM_50.text: Someone who bet that you'd never be foolish enough to actually show your face in this city again. But here you are, and the gold in my purse is soon to take flight.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_42.text: Our hearts bleed for you. Get to the point.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_39.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_39.text: You're a Sharran, aren't you? From Shadowheart's cloister.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.text: Hush - this is between myself and Shadowheart. There have been whispers about you, sister. About your faith, your loyalty...
OM_Shadowheart_COM_27.context: CinematicNodeContext: First line addressed to player, second line to ShadowheartNodeContext: First line addressed to player, second line to Shadowheart

OM_Shadowheart_COM_16.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_COM_16.text: I can't help but feel the strangest twinge of disgust as I look upon you. Is it true? Has our Lady forsaken you?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.text: Use your shared connection. Urge Shadowheart to lie.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.text: Of course not. A cover, to throw our enemies of the scent. I suppose you weren't deemed important enough to be informed of the plan.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_2.context: NodeContext: Overall Arc: Shadowheart has rejected Shar and is on a mission to Baldur's Gate to save her captive parents.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_9.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_COM_9.text: That would have been fine deception, in most cases. But your lying tongue cannot mask the empty pit in your spirit. She truly has abandoned you.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cold smile. NodeContext: Cold smile. He hasn't fallen for a lie.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_38.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_38.text: Reach out to her psionically. She should plead contrition, for now.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.text: I have... strayed, it is true. But I have returned to make amends. I will put my fate in the Mother Superior's hands, and trust that Lady Shar will guide her.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_7.context: NodeContext: Bluffing. Overall Arc: Shadowheart has rejected Shar and is on a mission to Baldur's Gate to save her captive parents.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_49.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_COM_49.text: Rennald... Now there is a name I haven't heard in a while. He is no more. I'll leave the rest for you to find out, heretic.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_22.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_COM_22.text: Though if I was you, I'd be very tempted to just forget it all and disappear. You have some form at doing so, after all.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_46.text: She has turned her back on your wretched goddess.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.text: I suppose that's the subtle approach dispensed with.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_35.context: NodeContext: Exasperated. Overall Arc: Shadowheart has rejected Shar and is on a mission to Baldur's Gate to save her captive parents.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_COM_30.text: Oh, don't be so harsh - it's plain to see that you've turned heretic, even if your friend had kept their mouth shut.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.text: I know the truth. I know my parents still live. Tell me where they are, and I have no quarrel with you.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_44.context: NodeContext: Direct, Overall Arc: Shadowheart has rejected Shar and is on a mission to Baldur's Gate to save her captive parents.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_COM_25.text: I'm afraid the quarrel is unavoidable, thanks to you.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.text: There have been whispers about you, sister. About your faith, your loyalty... your company.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ferg tosses the player a cold look before returning his attention to Shadowheart, addressing her.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_36.speaker: Ferg Drogher

OM_Shadowheart_COM_33.speaker: Player
OM_Shadowheart_COM_33.text: Spit it out, then. Where's she supposed to go?

OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.speaker: Ferg Drogher
OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.text: Your friend is inquisitive. A dangerous trait. Are you sure you want them listening in on this?
OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ferg tosses the player a cold look before returning his attention to Shadowheart, addressing her.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_40.speaker: Shadowheart
